name: INAddTasksIntentResponseCode
desc: Constants indicating the state of the response.

items.name: case unspecified
items.desc: The response didn’t specify a response code.

items.name: case ready
items.desc: You’re ready to handle the intent.

items.name: case inProgress
items.desc: The addition of tasks into the task list is still in progress.

items.name: case failure
items.desc: You were unable to add the tasks to the task list.

items.name: case failureRequiringAppLaunch
items.desc: The user must add the tasks from within your app.
